column4: Help! Trying to upgrade 9.04 to 9.10 my computer restarted half way through... Now I can get to a recovery shell, but otherwise it says that "one or more of the mounts listed in /etc/fstab can't be mounted"... Is my laptop pooped? Do I need to do a completely fresh install? or can I somehow recover stuff?
having a similar problem right now, on my box it looks like the system is still booting on the old kernle
my install didn't finish and the new kernel isn't available
In this case, I can't help you a lot :/
